name: Dark HorribleSubs (2018-2020)
description:
Just a really quick dark theme I threw together for the new design so I didn't have to look at a white website.
Pretty sure I got most of the white and I tried to keep it at least somewhat consistent, but it is what it is.


Make sure to check out my custom character cutout style as well! :)
https://userstyles.org/styles/167819/horriblesubs-custom-character
additional_info:
1/14/2019
Custom accent color option.

7/30/2018
Small fix

7/4/2018
Updated to fix some stuff with the updated version of the new design.

7/2/2018
Just a small update to change some colors around and fix some stuff, looks better now.

7/1/2018
New HorribleSubs website design released - First release of this style.
